intro: Perotis birmanica, commonly known as the Burmese perotis, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a small shrub or perennial herb that typically grows in moist, shaded environments. The plant features narrow, lance-shaped leaves and produces small, white or pale green flowers.
